name: Arad Skill Planner CSS
body:
### Welcome to the ARAD Skill Planner CSS Page
You can download a copy of the CSS files here to make a theme for the planner, which you can then submit to me or Aquarium.

### Why?
Because I feel like it would be nice to potentially have user contributed themes to the site.

### How?
I suggest you know at least a little CSS before trying to create a theme! I have provided a list of CSS IDs for your use, however. Check the support section (located below) if you need help.
https://github.com/DarkstarIV/DFO-Planner-CSS/wiki/CSS-IDs

### Authors and Contributors
Aquarium for the planner itself, and the base style css. Darkstar (me) created the dark style. 

### Support or Contact
Having trouble styling it? Send me a PM on any of the following sites for help. 

-DFO Source (DarkstarIV)
-Super Sword Action (Darkstar)
-Github (DarkstarIV)

Alternatively, if you find an issue with the CSS, please create an issue on the Issues page.

https://github.com/DarkstarIV/DFO-Planner-CSS/issues

If you wish to submit new features to the CSS files, please fork the repo, and submit a pull request.
tagline: CSS files for styling the Arad Skill Planner
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
